CustomField.description: Indicates whether Work Orders are auto-generated for the Maintenance Plan. This field auto-populates a checkbox of the same name in the Maintenance Plan upon creation. NOTE: If this field is set to 'true' on a Maintenance Plan, it will disable the ability to generate work orders manually.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether Work Orders are auto-generated for the Maintenance Plan. This field auto-populates a checkbox of the same name in the Maintenance Plan upon creation. NOTE: If this field is set to 'true' on a Maintenance Plan, it will disable the ability to generate work orders manually.
CustomField.label: Auto-generate Work Orders
